page.title: 19Transport & Leisure.
page.content:
As there is no local {bus service}the people of this area are completely isolated unless they have their own transport. It is at least six miles to the nearest town and the nearest country shop is three miles away. There are several vans which do their rounds on certain days, but they offer a limited service. Some families have to go to town by Taxi, shop and return the same way - this can be a day out for the family, but it is costly.
{Leisure.} Because of the lack of Public Transport most leisure activites are concentrated in the home and the immediate area. There is nothing for young people and the majority spend most of their time watching television or reading.
